multiple_choice.question: Long, long ago, how many suns were in the sky?
Where did the seventh sun hide?
Whose voice did the sun listen and come from behind ?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: They shot arrows at them and were able to kill six of the suns
With the suns gone, there was darkness everywhere
A rabbit told them about one of the seven suns who was still alive and hiding behind a hill

meanings.tribe: a social division in a traditional society consisting of families

meanings.peep: look quickly and furtively at something
meanings.relieved: no longer feeling distressed or anxious
